          <title>
            <string language="sl">Shrani dokument v novo mapo</string>
            <string language="en">Save document in new folder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Außer Dokument im neuen Heft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Économiser le document dans la nouvelle chemise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excepto o original no dobrador novo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risparmi il documento in nuovo dispositivo di 
piegatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτός από το έγγραφο στη νέα γραμματοθήκη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Excepto el documento en carpeta nueva</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kombinirana učna ura, ponavljanje, obravnava nove snovi, vadenje. Učenec zna ustvariti novo mapo. Učenec zna poiskati in shraniti dokument.</string>
            <string language="en">Presenting application microsoft word - word processor. Saving document in new folder.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">microsoft word</string>
            <string language="en">microsoft word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">urejevalnik besedila</string>
            <string language="en">word processor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">shranjevanje</string>
            <string language="en">saving</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendung Microsoft Word darstellen - 
Textverarbeitungsgerät. Einsparungdokument im neuen Heft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentant l'application Microsoft Word - unité de 
traitement de texte. Document d'économie dans la nouvelle 
chemise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentando a palavra de microsoft da 
aplicação - processador de palavra. Original do saving no 
dobrador novo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentando parola del microsoft di applicazione 
- programma di trattamento di testi. Documento di saving in 
nuovo dispositivo di piegatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσιάζοντας την εφαρμογή Microsoft Word - 
επεξεργαστής λέξεων. Έγγραφο αποταμίευσης στη νέα 
γραμματοθήκη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentando la aplicación Microsoft Word - 
procesador de textos. Documento del ahorro en carpeta nueva.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microsoft Word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverarbeitungsgerät</string>
          </keyword>
